other_tests.findings: Patient was disoriented, did not recall childbirth, and displayed frightened behavior with hallucinations.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Patient eventually became alert and calm after treatment.

other_tests.findings: Administered due to severe agitation and refusal of medications.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Patient's condition improved after 24 hours; she became alert and calm, requiring removal of restraints.

other_tests.findings: Initially vague recollection of hospital events, mood was depressed and labile with insomnia.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Mood improved on follow-up visits, and patient was able to care for her baby.

other_tests.findings: Patient underwent eight sessions due to severe depressive symptoms and suicidal thoughts.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Symptoms abated, but patient experienced persistent memory loss after therapy.
